## title

this model illustrates the annual N cycle in a lake in northern Israel

```{r }
# setwd("C:/Users/user/Documents/LakeN")

# read the data for the model
Kin=read.table("data for yoav.txt", header=TRUE)
hypso=read.table("data for yoav2.txt", header=TRUE)
miflas=read.table("data for yoav3.txt", header=TRUE)
Temp=read.table("data for yoav4.txt", header=TRUE)

#create an array for interpolating the data
newdata=list(dim=c(35,7,156), dimnames=list(c(seq(from=1, to=35, by=1)),c(colnames(Kin[4:10])), c(seq())))


```
